onHostStart().Description: This method is called when {@link PlaybackGlueHost is started. Subclass may override.

onHostStop().Description: This method is called when {@link PlaybackGlueHost is stopped. Subclass may override.

getPlaybackRowPresenter().Description: Returns the playback controls row Presenter managed by the glue layer.

onPlayCompleted().Description: Event when play finishes, subclass may handling repeat mode here.

Returns: The duration of the media item in milliseconds.

seekTo(long).Description: Seek media to a new position.

setSubtitle(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Sets the media subtitle. The subtitle will be rendered by default description presenter @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PlaybackTransportRowPresenter#setDescriptionPresenter_E@.

Parameters: boolean: True to enable auto hide after a timeout when media is playing.
setControlsOverlayAutoHideEnabled(boolea.Description: Sets the controls to auto hide after a timeout when media is playing.

isPlaying().Description: Returns true if media is currently playing.

Returns: The current buffered position of the media item in milliseconds.
The current position of the media item in milliseconds.

getTitle().Description: Returns the title of the media item.

getControlsRow().Description: Returns the playback controls row managed by the glue layer.

onDetachedFromHost().Description: This method is called when current associated @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackGlueHost_E@ is attached to a different @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackGlue_E@ or @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackGlueHost_E@ is destroyed . Subclass may override and call super.onDetachedFromHost() at last. A typical PlaybackGlue will release resources (e.g. MediaPlayer or connection to playback service) in this method.

onPreparedStateChanged().Description: Event when ready state for play changes.

setTitle(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Sets the media title. The title will be rendered by default description presenter @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PlaybackTransportRowPresenter#setDescriptionPresenter_E@.

isPrepared().Description: Returns true when the media player is prepared to start media playback. When returning false, app may listen to @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackGlue#PlayerCallback#onPreparedStateChanged_E@ event.

isControlsOverlayAutoHideEnabled().Description: Returns true if the controls auto hides after a timeout when media is playing.

Parameters: Drawable: The drawable representing cover image.
setArt(android.graphics.drawable.Drawabl.Description: Sets the drawable representing cover image. The drawable will be rendered by default description presenter in @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PlaybackTransportRowPresenter#setDescriptionPresenter_E@.

ClassDesc: A base abstract class for managing a @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PlaybackControlsRow_E@ being displayed in @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackGlueHost_E@. It supports standard playback control actions play/pause and skip next/previous. This helper class is a glue layer that manages interaction between the leanback UI components @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PlaybackControlsRow_E@ @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PlaybackRowPresenter_E@ and a functional @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlayerAdapter_E@ which represents the underlying media player. The app must pass a @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlayerAdapter_E@ in constructor for a specific implementation e.g. a @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#MediaPlayerAdapter_E@. The glue has two action bars: primary action bars and secondary action bars. Apps can provide additional actions by overriding @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackBaseControlGlue#onCreatePrimaryActions_E@ and / or @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackBaseControlGlue#onCreateSecondaryActions_E@ and respond to actions by overriding @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackBaseControlGlue#onActionClicked_E@. The subclass is responsible for implementing the "repeat mode" in @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackBaseControlGlue#onPlayCompleted_E@.
